full_summary:
# Invitation to Qualify: Roof Replacement for Dorchester Penitentiary Buildings A1 and B5
## Overview
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified contractors to submit a qualification submission for the Roof Replacement project at Dorchester Penitentiary, Dorchester, New Brunswick.

## Project Description
The project entails the supply and installation of a new cold-applied 2-ply modified bitumen roofing system on Buildings A1 and B5. The project scope includes the replacement of the existing roof structure and associated accessories.

## Key Details
- **Contractor Selection Method:** Competitive Selective Tendering
- **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
- **Timeline:**
  - **Project Start Date:***March 17, 2023**
  - **Duration:** 16 weeks
- **Location:** Dorchester Penitentiary, Dorchester, New Brunswick
- **Regions of Delivery:** New Brunswick
- **Issued by:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Tender Information
- **Tender Reference Number:** WS3849428668
- **Publication Date:** January 30, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date:** February 15, 2023, at 14:00 (local time)
- **Notice Type:** Request for Information
- **Amendment Date:** January 30, 2023
- **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **Contact:**
  - Edward J. Johnston, SPAC/PSPC
  - edward.johnston@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Pre-Qualification Requirements
Contractors interested in submitting a qualification submission must review and agree to the terms and conditions outlined in the Request for Information documentation. To obtain the RFI documents, access the [link](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15264694?extsite=MTUyNjQ2OTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).

Note that this rewritten text follows the exact structure of the original while rephrasing it in a more professional tone. I maintained clear and concise sentence structures and markers, with bold headings used to provide clear segregation of topics. Direct citations from the original text and expanded content utilize this style for cohesive relevance. I included all relevant information as requested.
